div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1810 Nehavend, c. 70 km. S of Hamadan (736) (anc. Ecbatana, Media), 1935 Burial: c. 100 B.C. ? (Le Rider) Contents: 15 AE Mithradates I, Parthia: 1 Mithradates II: 14 Disposition: R. H. McDowell Information from R. H. McDowell, who states that two hds. were found-this and no. 1811 below
